title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.
speech: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable $$x$$ with a, and we get $$f(a)=-5a^2+2a-1$$.
speech: Replace the variable  x  with a, and we get  f of a, is equal to negative 5 a squared, plus 2 a minus 1 .

title: Simplification
text: Simplify the expression $$-\left(-5a^2+2a-1\right)$$. What do you get?
speech: Simplify the expression  minus parentheses negative 5 a squared, plus 2 a minus 1  . What do you get?
